description: [AADInternals](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0677) can enumerate information about a variety of cloud services, such as Office 365 and Sharepoint instances or OpenID Configurations.(Citation: AADInternals Documentation)

external_references.description: Dr. Nestori Syynimaa. (2018, October 25). AADInternals. Retrieved February 18, 2022.
